item.description:
Your Blissful Day will begin with an all levels Yoga class, ending the class with a Yoga Nidra Meditation, followed by a scrumptious Vegan Lunch. After lunch, we will partake in a Qi Gong class while being bathed in the gentle vibration sounds of Gongs and Tibetan Bowls.

Date - Sunday, March 6th Group Size – 12 per Group
Location - The Conduit Center, 1227 Burnside Ave. #1, East Hartford, CT
To register (860) 745-1500 / Email - blissfultravelswithmargaret@cox.net
Cost - $65.00
Make check payable to: Blissful Travels with Margaret
(Send two weeks prior) - 275 Pearl Street, Enfield, CT 08082

Instructors:
Loren Hardy – All Levels Yoga Class & Yoga Nidra Owen James – Gongs & Tibetan Bowls Therapy
Erik Harris – Qi Gong
Schedule: Guest arrival time – 10:15 (please be prompt)

Yoga and Guided Meditation - 10:45 – 12:00
Class Instructor, Loren Hardy, RYT of Loren Hardy Yoga will start the day with a one hour, all levels yoga class and end the class with a Yoga Nidra meditation. This guided, deep relaxation is especially helpful for those with chronic physical or emotional pain.

Vegan Lunch – 12:00 – 1:00
Indulge in a tasty, full course, Vegan lunch prepared by Chef Margaret. Enjoy seasonal specialties like Roasted Red Pepper – Carrot Soup, Warm Red Potato Salad, Quinoa, Cranberry & Walnut Salad, Pesto Crème Polenta Squares, Grilled Vegetable Linguine, Fruited Rice and more. Your choice of refreshing herbal teas, juice and water are included.

Qi Gong with Gong and Tibetan Bowl Sound Bath - 1:15 – 2:45
Class Instructor - Erik Harris, Certified Qi Gong Practitioner and energy healer. His classes introduce a series of gentle standing exercises that focus on allowing energy to flow freely through the meridians of your body. The exercises will be relaxing and energizing at the same time. Students will feel a greater sense of well-being and deeper connection with all of life. To contact Erik – email: chiforhealing@gmail.com.

Owen James, Vibrational Alchemist and operator of The Conduit Center will bath us with the sound of gongs and Tibetan bowls. These gongs and bowls send vibrations through your body massaging you at a cellular level. The singing gongs become very therapeutic, providing an environment for self-healing.

Chocolate Buffet, Tea, & Conversation – 3:00 – 4:00 Chocolate Cake, Chocolate Strawberries and Truffles
item.why: A revitalizing day will spring us into a new season :)
item.name: Blissfull Day
